description:
It was discovered that Nanopb incorrectly handled certain decode messages.
An attacker could possibly use this cause a denial of service or expose
sensitive information. (CVE-2020-26243)

It was discovered that Nanopb incorrectly handled certain decode messages.
An attacker could possibly use this issue to cause a denial of service
or execute arbitrary code. (CVE-2021-21401)

nanopb.description: Protocol Buffers with small code size

title: Nanopb vulnerabilities
action: In general, a standard system update will make all the necessary changes.
isummary: Several security issues were fixed in Nanopb.
